title: Ezzo Sausage Company Recalls Meat Products due to Possible Listeria Contamination
summary: WASHINGTON, Nov. 9, 2019 Ezzo Sausage Company, a Columbus, Ohio establishment, is recalling approximately 25,115 pounds of sausage products that may be adulterated with Listeria monocytogenes, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. The ready-to-eat sausage products were produced...
